name: Finance-tracker
tagline: a ruby app for tracking stocks
body:
== README This is a Ruby project for tracking stocks that includes the 7 requirements given to me to make it work. You can sign up, create a profile, add and track stocks, add friends and discuss or view each other's stocks. Built using Ruby 2.1.5, Rails version 4.2.3 and Devise. Allons-y! [View app on Heroku](https://finance-tracker-red.herokuapp.com/users/sign_in)
![Ruby Gem](https://blog.rosehosting.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/ruby-icon.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
